# api_spec.Witness proto

  meta: {
    http: {
      method: "POST"
      path_template: "/api/create_file"
      host: "www.akibox.com"
    }
  }
  responses: {
    key: "naAThnYPT5A="
    value: {
      struct: {
        fields: {
          key: "name"
          value: {
            primitive: {
              string_value: {
                value: "foo"
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
      meta: {
        http: {
          body: {
            content_type: JSON
          }
          response_code: 200
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
